parameters.name: AccountName
parameters.description:
The name of the account that has permissions to access all databases on the ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance.

This parameter is required only when the Type parameter is set to VERTICAL.

parameters.name: DbInstType
parameters.description: The type of the storage instances that are used by the PolarDB-X 1.0 database. Set the value to RDS.

parameters.name: DbInstanceIsCreating
parameters.description: Specifies whether the required ApsaraDB RDS for MySQL instance is being created.

parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the PolarDB-X 1.0 database you want to create.

parameters.name: DrdsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the PolarDB-X 1.0 instance on which you want to create the database.

parameters.name: Encode
parameters.description: The encoding method that is used by the database.

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password that is used to log on to the database.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The partitioning mode of the database. Valid values:

*   **HORIZONTAL**: The database is horizontally partitioned (sharded).
*   **VERTICAL**: The database is vertically partitioned.
